messages.1000072421: Enhances Toxic Swirl to deal additional damage. Press the regular attack button to activate. Roto-whirl can be used even after the extra attack.\n#yAdditional Hit Damage: {0}% of Toxic Twirl damage

The additional hit deals damage without poison and is not affected by the bubble.\n#yAdditional Hit Damage: {0}% of Toxic Spill damage\nAmount Recovered in Wide Range: {1}% of Toxic Spill damage
